insert into waybill_consumable_relation ( waybill_code,consumable_code,receive_quantity,confirm_quantity, operate_user_erp,operate_time,create_time,is_delete,ts, consumable_name,consumable_type,consumable_type_name,volume,volume_coefficient,specification,unit,packing_charge,confirm_volume ) values
( #{item.waybillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.consumableCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.receiveQuantity,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.confirmQuantity,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.operateUserErp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, now(), 0, now(), #{item.consumableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.consumableType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.consumableTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.volume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.volumeCoefficient,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.specification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.packingCharge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.confirmVolume,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

update waybill_consumable_relation
waybill_code = #{waybillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
consumable_code = #{consumableCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_quantity = #{receiveQuantity,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
confirm_quantity = #{confirmQuantity,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
confirm_volume = #{confirmVolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
operate_user_code = #{operateUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_user_erp = #{operateUserErp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pack_user_erp = #{packUserErp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ts = #{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update waybill_consumable_relation set is_delete = 1 where id in
#{item,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select waybill_code,receive_quantity,confirm_quantity,pack_user_erp,consumable_code,name,type,type_name,pci.volume,pci.volume_coefficient,pci.specification,pci.unit, packing_charge,confirm_volume from waybill_consumable_relation wcr left join packing_consumable_info pci on wcr.consumable_code = pci.code where wcr.is_delete = 0 and wcr.waybill_code in
#{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from waybill_consumable_relation where waybill_code = #{waybillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and consumable_code = #{consumableCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_delete = 0 limit 1

select
from waybill_consumable_relation where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by ts desc limit 1
select count(1) as num from waybill_consumable_relation where 1=1

select count(1) as num from packing_consumable_info pci inner join waybill_consumable_relation wcr on pci.code = wcr.consumable_code where pci.is_delete = 0 and wcr.is_delete = 0 and waybill_code = #{waybillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(1) as num from waybill_consumable_relation where is_delete = 0 and waybill_code = #{waybillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
